issue.title: [Benchmarking] Support for on-demand and automated benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5070](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5070). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We want to be able to request for a benchmark comparison in a PR against master. This should be triggered via a github comment.

The automated benchmarks would track the master branch and be triggered either on each merge or nightly.
